effect_entries.effect: Records the number of times the trainer's Pokémon have messed up in the Pokéathlon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer's Pokémon have messed up in the Pokéathlon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ポケスロンの　記録が　はいっている。
ポケモンの　失敗した　回数が
記録された　カード。

It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon failed in the Pokéathlon.

Contiene i tuoi dati Pokéathlon.
Su questa Scheda è registrato il numero di
errori dei tuoi Pokémon.

Esfera añil que, según dicen, guarda una estrecha
relación con las leyendas de Hoenn.

Speichert deine Pokéathlon-Rekorde. Die Karte
zeigt, wie viele Schnitzer du dir geleistet hast.

Contient vos données du Pokéathlon.
Sur cette carte est inscrit le nombre d’erreurs
de vos Pokémon.

포켓슬론의 기록이 들어 있다.
포켓몬이 실패한 횟수가
기록된 카드.

ポケスロンの　きろくが　はいっている。
ポケモンの　しっぱいした　かいすうが
きろくされた　カード。

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon have failed.

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon have failed.

Contient vos données du Pokéathlon.
Sur cette carte est inscrit le nombre
d’erreurs de vos Pokémon.

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon have failed.
